strIntroduction: One of the most popular modes of transport for visitors to Vietnam!

strIntroduction: Tay Ninh, near the Cambodian border, is home to the unique Cao Dai sect, whose patron saints include Joan of Arc, Victor Hugo and Winston Churchill to name a few. The religion is a hybrid of Buddhism, Taoism, Confucianism and Christianity. The Cao Dai Temple at Tay Ninh has been described as a Walt Disney fantasia of the East. The temple’s exterior is decorated with multi-colored dragons of all shapes and sizes competing for space with a number of swastikas. You will also have a great opportunity to visit and learn more about a historic site as Cu Chi tunnels. Here was Vietnamese struggle for indepence and liberty. It will be an interesting trip to join with us.
strTitle: Cu Chi Tunnel and Cao Dai Temple Full Day

strIntroduction: Sapa (or Chapa- the “sandy place”) is a mountainous town in Northern. This charming place is known for its picturesque landscape and rich cultural diversity. Set against the Hoang Lien Son mountain range near the Tonkinese Alps in Northwest Vietnam, this destination offers an array of exciting adventures for local and foreign visitors alike.
strTitle: 3D2N tour : SAPA – CAT CAT – LAO CHAI – TAN VAN – BAC HA (4-star hotel)

strIntroduction: Our tour guide will pick you up and our trip will start to visit Phu Quoc Island in the North: Fish sauce factory: a sauce type famous on the island with name "Nuoc Mam" produced from fresh fish. “Fish Sauce in the marking - The essential spices to all Vietnamese Cusines”.
strTitle: Phu Quoc Island 1 Day Excursion

strIntroduction: Located 130km far from Hanoi in the west, Mai Chau is an attractive destination that you don’t want to miss. strIntroduction: 和另一半來場下龍灣的甜蜜浪漫之旅吧！美麗的下龍灣是遠古時期的自然奇觀，根據越南的神話傳說，很久以前，有一條母龍降落在這個海灣，擋住了洶湧的波濤，使這一帶人民安居樂業，因此人們便把這個海灣稱為“下龍灣”。下龍灣有「海上桂林」之稱，聯合國教科文組織於1994年將下龍灣列入世界文化遺產
strTitle: Halong Bay 4-Star Huong Hai Sealife Cruise 2D1N
